text: Andrzej Wincenty Górski (15 August 1920 – 22 November 2017) was a Polish academic and chemist. He was born in Warsaw. He was Professor of Inorganic Chemistry at the Warsaw University of Technology. He was the author of a large number of research articles on the systematics of chemical objects, as well as academic textbooks: "General Chemistry" and the two-volume textbook "Chemistry". Górski died in Warsaw on 22 November 2017 of complications from a stroke at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Polish academics Category:Polish chemists Category:Writers from Warsaw Category:Scientists from Warsaw
title: Andrzej Wincenty Górski
